item.description:
It's Officially Fall!

The Red Sox have finally Clinched!!!!

 

Yeah-the Sox have officially clinched-a losing season, so it's time to celebrate the ending of this pathetic season-and luckily enough, thanks to Mad King Ludwig, it's Octoberfest!!

Sam Adams and Beer Summit kick it off this weekend at the Castle on Arlington Street  in Boston, Saturday is sold out, but if you didn't get you tickets yet tickets for the VIP reception tomorrow night are still available for $37.50-which includes a Octoberfest Toast with Jim Koch from Sam Adams-plus games prizes and beer-I'll see everyone else there on Saturday.

And to begin the second week next Friday, Harpoon will be having their Octoberfest down at the Harpoon Brewery on Atlantic Ave under the tent, just like Munich.  live bands, games and great beer-both Friday night and again next Saturday.

I'll be finishing my Octoberfest celebration (but not my fall celebrations) the American way at the Boston Cocktail Summit (Oct 4-6) at the Park Plaza and Royal Sonesta hotels.  Tons of seminars exploring the American invention, the cocktail, as well as tastings and parties-including the 150th Anniversary of Barcardi-with a Havana style party and the 75th Anniversary of the bible of cocktails-MR Boston.  Seminars and events are in the $25-$50 range-so join me in a cocktail-Check it out at BostonCocktailSummit.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me around the Utopia, I'll have the Sam Adams shirt and hat and a pint
item.name: Octoberfest!!!!!
